alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 01 at 8:03PM CST until March 05 at 7:42AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. .Heavy rainfall Thursday night and Friday will likely cause the river to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood - East Gate. * WHEN...From Friday evening to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, flood waters affect the lower TA 250 Training Area and Highway J east of Fort Wood East Gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 2.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached Friday evening. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
